title: The Historical Changes Domain Schema
description: Contains a list with important events happened along the entitys's history

EventsList.title: List of Events
EventsList.description: Contains a list of the main events happened across the entity's life

Type.title: Event Type (enum)
Type.description: Used to group similar types of events

TrType.title: Event Type (translateable)
TrType.description: Used to group similar types of events

Description.title: Event Description
Description.description: Description of the event, not linked to an enum. Used also to tell more specific info rather than the event type

Date.title: Event Date
Date.description: Date of publication or exact date when then event happened

Text.title: Event Text
Text.description: Specific text of the event, in case of being published, like the new share capital value or a previous address of the entity
examples: COMERCIALIZACIÓN AL POR MAYOR O MENOR EN EN MERCADO DE PRODUCTOS DEL RAMO DE ALIMENTACIÓN. PRESTACIÓN DE SERVICIOS DE COLABORACIÓN EMPRESARIAL DE TODO TIPO PARA LA COMERCIALIZACIÓN DE PRODUCTOS Y SERVICIOS DE TELECOMUNICACIONES

VendorDescriptionId.title: Vendor Description Id
VendorDescriptionId.description: Used for those vendor whom send a code linked to the description of the event. For example, act code

HelpText.title: Help text
HelpText.description: Optional text explaining the meaning of the current event
